name: play2VR
description: play2VR播放器前端代码,基于gl-matrix, webvr-polyfill
author: 2278083193@qq.com

scripts.build-mangle: browserify ../js/src/vrvideo.js | bundle-collapser | node mangle | uglifyjs -mc --mangle-props --mangle-regex="/^_/" | node pre > ../js/play2VR.js
scripts.build: browserify ../js/src/vrvideo.js | bundle-collapser | uglifyjs -mc --mangle-props --mangle-regex="/^_/" --preamble="/*! Copyright 2016-2018 Keynes Software Co.,Ltd. */" > ../js/play2VR.js
scripts.build-track: browserify ../js/src/videotrack.js | bundle-collapser | node mangle | uglifyjs -mc --mangle-props --mangle-regex="/^_/" | node pre > ../js/play2VRTrack.js
